        public void setCreditCard(java.lang.String credit)
        setCreditCard - setter. Sets credit card number for a reader. In case of an illegal input (credit card string with letters i.e) an exception will be triggered and an error message will pop
        Parameters:

      • setrType

        public void setrType(readerType rType)
        setrType() - setter sets a reader type. Any attempt to set an illegal reader type (different than "onebyone" or "periodic"), will trigger an error message
        Parameters:
        rType - - ENUM
